thread.title: Khloe Kardashian looks hot as she soaks up the sun with boyfriend Tristan Thompson
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian looks hot as she soaks up the sun with boyfriend Tristan Thompson

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Khloe Kardashian looks hot as she soaks up the sun with boyfriend Tristan Thompson
text:
Khloe Kardashian looks hot as she soaks up the sun with boyfriend Tristan Thompson The couple enjoyed a break on the beach during their holiday in Jamaica Share Khloe Kardashian posted her holiday snaps to Instagram Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Khloe Kardashian showed off her beach body as she soaked up the sun in Jamaica with her hot boyfriend with the impossible abs, Tristan Thompson. 
Khloe and Tristan have been dating for just over a year, and she recently called him ’The One’. 
The couple are holidaying on the island, and have documented the trip on Instagram, posting the enviable pic of her and Tristan in the sea, and a shot of her and her ‘crew’ on the beach; Khloe, Tristan and three pals. Khloe Kardashian and Tristan Thompson looked incredible on the beach (Photo: KhloeKardashian/Instagram) Khloe and her crew, getting a piggy back from Tristan (Photo: KhloeKardashian/Instagram) Khloe and Tristan have been dating since last year (Photo: Splash) 
Khloe divorced her ex husband Lamar Odom last year, and earlier this month, Khloe praised her new romance with basketball player Tristan , describing it as “positive and healthy.” 
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was the picture of health and happiness during an appearance on a US TV show, where she gushed about her athlete beau. 
“I feel really happy and secure and I’m just in a really positive, healthy relationship. 
“I’m in a really good space right now in my life,” she told The Talk. Khloe and her man share a smooch on Snapchat (Photo: Snapchat) Khloe's described Tristan as 'The One' (Photo: Splash News) 
Khloe, 31, has been dating Tristan, 25, since last year, and regularly commutes from her home in Los Angeles to visit him in Cleveland, Ohio, where he’s based with the Cleveland Cavalliers. 
She said: “I actually love Cleveland. Everyone is so nice there, and I love the four seasons. I love that it snows! I spent Christmas there and it was snowing. I’m not used to that. 
“I’m born and raised in California, so everyone thinks I’m crazy for loving the snow," she laughed. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
